org.mini2Dx.ui.render

Interface TextInputableRenderNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionableRenderNode, HoverableRenderNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextBoxRenderNode

    public interface TextInputableRenderNode
extends ActionableRenderNode
    Interface for RenderNodes that can handle text input
